topic.title: Discuss (U3): Tectonic Plates
topic.text:
Earthquakes and plate tectonic are pretty cool. California is located at the edge of 2 plates, that is why they have so many earthquakes.

  • Identify the two plates that are colliding.
  • Identify the type of plate boundary that is involved.
  • Identify what kind of movement is occurring  (subduction, divergence, convergence).
  • Identify at least two other areas in the world where tectonic plates are colliding.
  • And, share whether you have ever personally experienced the results of tectonic plates colliding. And, if you have, when and where that was.

Initial posts are due on Wednesday by 11:59pm, in which you use full sentences and proper grammar.

Respond to at least two other students' posts (at a minimum), which are due on Sunday by 11:59pm.

  • Be sure to respond to other students' posts with a substantive comment using full sentences and proper grammar.
